channel.title: New HD Project
channel.description:
Hi everybody im Paymon! :cool: I come to you today to seek assistance in my new project zadehscape (i donno about the name if you have any better names please state).
[b]This is what i need:[/b] •BETA Testers - 2/0 •Client Developer - 1/0 •Hoster - 1/0 •Coder - 1/0 •website maker •webclient
ok so about the server:(SORRY I COULDNT GET ANY PICS) •It is gonna be a pk server. •You can get pk points. •New prayer book. •godswords,bandos,armadyl armour can be obtained from pk points. •donating will get unlock vls,sol,claws and vestas armour. •no spawning or duping. •thieving,pk points can obtain money or 50mill is given every day to donators.
ok so the financial side of things: ALL money obtained from donations will be divided by the number of staff and then shared out. ok to get in touch just add me on msn (paymans2005@yahoo.co.uk) or post application on this. BY THE WAY I AM PLANNING TO MAKE A NORMAL SERVER SO STAFF WOULD BE NEEDED FOR THAT TOO = )

item.title: New HD Project
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Hi everybody im Paymon!
I come to you today to seek assistance in my new project zadehscape (i donno about the name if you have any better names please state).

This is what i need:
•BETA Testers - 2/0
•Client Developer - 1/0
•Hoster - 1/0
•Coder - 1/0
•website maker
•webclient

ok so about the server:(SORRY I COULDNT GET ANY PICS)
•It is gonna be a pk server.
•You can get pk points.
•New prayer book.
•godswords,bandos,armadyl armour can be obtained from pk points.
•donating will get unlock vls,sol,claws and vestas armour.
•no spawning or duping.
•thieving,pk points can obtain money or 50mill is given every day to donators.

ok so the financial side of things:
ALL money obtained from donations will be divided by the number of staff and then shared out.
ok to get in touch just add me on msn (paymans2005@yahoo.co.uk) or post application on this.
BY THE WAY I AM PLANNING TO MAKE A NORMAL SERVER SO STAFF WOULD BE NEEDED FOR THAT TOO = )
